results.title: Where angels fear to tread
results.creator_credit: Charles Sturridge, Derek Granger, Stage Screen Productions, LWT and Sovereign Picture
results.brief_description: An adaptation of E.M. Forster’s novel of romance and revenge, starring Helen Mirren, Helena Bonham-Carter, Rupert Graves, Judy Davis and Giovanni Guidelli. While visiting Italy with her companion Caroline, widowed Lilia Herriton is enraptured not only by the countryside but by a younger handsome Tuscan who seduces her. The incident outrages her family and in-law Philip Herriton arrives to end the affair but it is too late as the couple are married. After a tragedy occurs, Philip and his sister embark on another mission; to bring back the couple’s infant son. A tug-of-war ensues between father and family.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Charles Sturridge, Derek Granger, Stage Screen Productions, LWT and Sovereign Picture

results.title: Tripoli Melbourne & Me!
results.creator_credit: Dania Dabliz, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Dania Dabliz’s life in Tripoli was full of fun, friends and parties. When she migrated to Melbourne she wondered if she would find the same things again?
results.creator_credit_for_label: Dania Dabliz, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: country school diary_13
results.brief_description: An anonymous digital dairy created by a young person as part of a day long workshop run by ACMI. Each diary is scripted and a voiceover recorded by the individual young person. Some diaries use photographs brought in by the participant, but the primary visual content is often black and white, ‘stock’ footage of a poetic nature. At no point should the creator or school be positively identified when screening this work.
